abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The empyrean's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: greater restoration, pass without trace, water breathing, water walk
1/day each: commune, dispel evil and good, earthquake, fire storm, plane shift (self only)

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If the empyrean fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The empyrean has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The empyrean's weapon attacks are magical.
